HardCode.Text: #n#t/* Poll for DLL end of calibration */#n#if (USE_TIMEOUT == 1)

#endif#t/*USE_TIMEOUT*/#n#n#twhile(LL_HRTIM_IsActiveFlag_DLLRDY(HRTIM1) == RESET){#n#if (USE_TIMEOUT == 1)#n#t#tif (LL_SYSTICK_IsActiveCounterFlag())#t/* Check Systick counter flag to decrement the time-out value */#n#t#t{#n#t#t#t#tif(Timeout-- == 0)#n#t#t#t#t{#n#t#t#t#t#tError_Handler();#t/* error management */#n#t#t#t#t}#n#t#t}#n#endif#t/* USE_TIMEOUT */#n#t}#n#n
